remarks: The ring base set of the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhbase.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhbase.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhbase.c $e |- C = ( Base ` F ) $.
dvhbase $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> C = E ) $.
